{{infobox character | people=[[Sindar|Sinda]] | image=Konstantin Grigorjev - Celebrian.jpg | caption="Celebrian" by [[:Category:Images by Konstantin Grigorjev|Konstantin Grigorjev]] | name=Celebrían | pronun=[[Sindarin|S]], {{IPA|[kɛlɛˈbriː.an]}} | othernames= | titles=Lady of [[Rivendell]] | position= | location=[[Eregion]], [[Rivendell|Imladris]], [[Lothlórien]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SA|300}} | birthlocation= | rule= | sailedwest={{TA|2510}} (aged 5650) | sailedfrom=[[Grey Havens]] | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=[[Celeborn]] and [[Galadriel]] | siblings= | spouse=[[Elrond]] | children=[[Elladan]], [[Elrohir]], [[Arwen]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Celebrían''' was an [[Elves|Elf]]-lady, the daughter of [[Celeborn]]{{App|TA}}, entry for the year 109, p. 1085 and [[Galadriel]]{{FR|Farewell}}, p. 227 and the wife of [[Elrond]]. She was the mother of [[Arwen]] and the twins [[Elrohir]] and [[Elladan]].{{App|TA}}, entries for the years 130 and 241, p. 1085 Her daughter would later marry [[Aragorn|Aragorn Elessar]], hero of the [[War of the Ring]],{{App|Chief}}, entry for the year 3019, ''Mid-year's Day'' and become the Queen of the [[Reunited Kingdom]]{{RK|Partings}}, p. 974. ==History== Celebrían was born early in the Second Age, likely in {{SA|300}}, when Galadriel refused to return to [[Eressëa]], and passed over the [[Blue Mountains|Mountains]].{{NM|P1ix}}, p. 65 Celebrían lived in [[Eregion]], and later moved to [[Lothlórien|Lórien]] with her mother in {{SA|1350}}. In {{SA|1701}}, she went to [[Rivendell]] with Galadriel searching for Celeborn, where she first met Lord Elrond, who loved her in secret.{{UT|Concerning}}, pp. 234, 240 Their marriage was delayed by the wars against [[Sauron]],{{NM|Ages}}{{rp|135}} though they would eventually wed in {{TA|109}}. Their first children, the twins [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]], were born in {{TA|130|n}}, and their daughter [[Arwen]] in {{TA|241|n}}. She had inherited the [[Elfstone]] from her mother, which was later given to Arwen, her daughter.{{UT|Elessar}}, p. 251 [[File:Elena Kukanova - Elrond and Celebrían.jpg|left|200px|thumb|''Elrond and Celebrían'' by [[Elena Kukanova]]]] In {{TA|2509}}, on a trip to [[Lothlórien|Lórien]] to visit her parents, she was waylaid by [[Orcs of the Misty Mountains]] in the [[Redhorn Pass]]. She was captured and tormented, receiving a poisoned wound. Her sons rescued her and she was physically healed by Elrond, but never fully recovered in mind or spirit, and no longer wished to stay in Middle-earth. She left for the [[Grey Havens]] and passed over the [[Belegaer|Great Sea]] the following year.{{App|Eriador}}, entry about Chieftain Arahad I, p. 1043 She was followed by Elrond and her mother Galadriel, who eventually took the [[White Ship]] in the end of the [[Third Age]] and also passed the [[Great Sea]] to the [[Undying Lands]],{{RK|Havens}}, p. 1029 where they presumably reunited with her. Later Celeborn and possibly her sons, Elladan and Elrohir, also went to the Grey Havens to sail to the Undying Lands,{{FR|Records}}, p. 15 and presumably reunited with Celebrían. ==Etymology== {{pronounce|Sindarin - Celebrían.mp3|Gilgamesh}} ''Celebrían'' is a [[Sindarin]] name{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2160008161.html|articlename=S. ''Celebrían'' f.|website=Eldamo|accessed=12 September 2024}}{{HM|RC}}, p. 338, which means "Silver queen"{{L|345}}, p. 423. ''{{FoA|1}} - {{FoA|220|n}}''|DAU=''unknown daughters''}} {{familytree/end}} ==Other versions of the legendarium== J.R.R. Tolkien tried to define the birth-year of Celebrían in different manuscripts, specially those dealing with chronology and Elven growth. Here are the dates of the [[Second Age]], presented in chronological order as Tolkien considered them: {{SA|300|n}} (circa),{{NM|P3xvi}}, p. 346 300 ("probably"), 260 or {{SA|350|n}},{{NM|P1x}}, p. 73 {{SA|850|n}} (a proposal while calculating her age),{{NM|P1xi}}, pp. 77, 79 9 (circa) or 45.{{NM|P1xviii}}, p. 149 In "[[Concerning Galadriel and Celeborn]]" (the only narrative dealing with a complete history of Middle-earth during the [[Second Age]]), both Celebrían and [[Amroth]] are children of Galadriel and Celeborn, but in later texts J.R.R. Tolkien gave Amroth a [[Sindar]]in origin.{{UT|Amroth}}, p. 244 In the drafts of ''[[The Tale of Years]]'' of the Third Age, Elrond married Celebrían c. [[Third Age|T.A.]] 2500 and their children were born in the same century. In {{TA|2600}}, she was slain by Orcs instead of captured.{{PM|VIII}}{{rp|226}} The marriage was later changed to 2300, and her capture and departure to 2509.{{rp|234–6}} ==Portrayal in adaptations== [[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Celebrían.jpg|thumb|right|Celebrían in ''The Lord of the Rings Online'']] '''2019: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':''' :Celebrían was held captive at Shathur-munzu, an abandoned dwarven outpost of the fallen [[Khazad-dûm]]. :During the journey to [[Minas Tirith]] for her wedding, Lady [[Arwen]] wishes to visit the place where her mother was being held. She comes to Shathur-munzu in the company of Lady [[Galadriel]] and they speak of Celebrían and her fate together. {{references}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Celebrian}} [[Category:House of Finarfin]] [[Category:Moriquendi]] [[Category:Second Age characters]] [[Category:Sindar]] [[Category:Sindarin names]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Celebrían]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:elfes:teleri:sindar:celebrian]] [[fi:Celebrían]]
